H0.text: What is the spiked stick or prod used for driving cattle called. Poking Stick

H1.text: What is the spiked stick or prod used for driving cattle called. Cattle Poke

H2.text: What is the spiked stick or prod used for driving cattle called. Herding Rod

H3.text: What is the spiked stick or prod used for driving cattle called. Goad

A4.text: The goad is a traditional farming implement, used to spur or guide livestock, usually oxen.

A5.text: It is also known as the cattle prod.

A6.text: A cattle prod is a handheld device commonly used to make cattle or other livestock move by striking or poking them.

A7.text: A cattle prod, also called a stock prod or a hot stick, is a handheld device commonly used to make cattle or other livestock move by striking or poking them.
